io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.mod.registration

Class BlockTE<T extends net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.registries.ForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>
      • net.minecraft.block.AbstractBlock
        • net.minecraft.block.Block
          • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.mod.registration.BlockBase
            • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.mod.registration.BlockTE<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Registerable, net.minecraft.util.IItemProvider, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockGUI

    public class BlockTE<T extends net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity>
extends BlockBase
    Base class for blocks with tile entities for mods using ModXRegistration. This will automatically set the creative tab if it's defined in the mod and register a block item and a tile entity type..

    The constructor requires a TileEntity class. The tile entity class must define a public constructor with one argument of type TileEntityType for this to create a tile entity type. This class will do the magic to wire the tile entity to the block and invoke the constructor.

      • shouldDropInventory

        protected boolean shouldDropInventory(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                                      net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                      net.minecraft.block.BlockState state)
        Override this to prevent the inventory of the tile entity to be dropped when the block is broken. To automatically drop the inventory the tile entity must provide an item handler capability that is an instance of IItemHandlerModifiable
